q1.a: We’re a venture fund backing experienced AI founders from day zero. Built from an invite‑only, zero‑equity community where 82% are repeat founders and 32% have prior exits.

q2.a: Our zero‑equity retreats build trust first, eliminating adverse selection and securing MFN & pro‑rata rights, getting privileged access others can’t.

q3.a: First money in; then double‑down with $500K–$1.5M core checks. MFN and pro‑rata on every investment.
